Commentary: (VIN 1.2.8) adhikaraṇaṃ nāma cattāri adhikaraṇāni, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
Example1: tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā, amūlakañ’c'eva taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti bhikkhu ca dosaṃ patiṭṭhāti, saṅghādiseso
Example2: yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihat’ādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example2: bhikkhu yathā iṇaṃ yathā rogaṃ yathā bandhan’āgāraṃ yathā dāsabyaṃ yathā kantār’addhāna-maggaṃ, ime pañca nīvaraṇe appahīne attani samanupassati
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Meaning IN CONTEXT: for the purpose (of); for the sake (of); for the benefit (of)
Example1: “yassa khv’āhaṃ atthāya cittaṃ paṇidahiṃ so me attho abhinipphanno. handa dāni paṭisaṃharāmi”
Example2: bhikkhugaṇanā nāma imasmiṃ uposath'agge uposath'atthāya sannipatitā bhikkhū ettakā'ti, bhikkhūnaṃ gaṇanā.
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Meaning IN CONTEXT: change of mind; change of opinion; lit. otherwise state
Example1: atha khv’etaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānañ’c’eva appasādāya, pasannānañ’ca ekaccānaṃ aññathattāyā”ti.
Example2: taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gahapati, alaṃ nu kho tassa purisassa aññathattāyā”ti?
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example1: rañño'pi kho, bhikkhave, pasenadissa kosalassa atth'eva aññathattaṃ atthi vipariṇāmo. evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako tasmim'pi nibbindati.
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example1: sambahulā bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññik’aṅgaṃ piṇḍapātik’aṅgaṃ paṃsukūlik’aṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example1:
yathā hi aṅga-sambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti.
evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti satto’ti sammuti
Example2: handa mayaṃ satta-sambojjh’aṅga-pāṭhaṃ bhaṇāmase
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Meaning IN CONTEXT: a constituent part of the body; a limb; member
Example1: “ubhato-daṇḍakena ce’pi kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgam’aṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatrā’pi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsana-karo.
Example2: yo pana bhikkhu, otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena, mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāya-saṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyya, hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ, saṅghādiseso.
